comment._content: Jaffrey Meeting House. The clock was added in the early 1900's.

comment.realname: Keene Public Library and the Historical Society of Cheshire County
comment.author: 25960495@N06
comment._content: Ah, Jeff, thanks! I was hoping that someone would recognize these unknown buildings and add info for them. We really appreciate that info and I'll change them as they are identified. (BTW, your wife was our real estate agent for my first house purchase in Cheshire Co., although I've subsequently moved to another house.)
comment.authorname: Keene and Cheshire County (NH) Historical Photos
